skill.name: create-skill
skill.description: Guide for creating new skills in Kai's personal AI infrastructure. Use when user wants to create, update, or structure a new skill that extends capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations. Follows both Anthropic skill standards and PAI-specific patterns.
skill.summary: Guide for creating new skills in Kai's personal AI infrastructure. Use when user wants to create, up...
skill.author: AaronAbuUsama

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation and template skill with no executable code, network calls, or file system access. Contains only markdown files providing guidance for skill creation.

content.user_title: Create AI skills with templates and workflows
content.value_statement: Building new AI skills requires following consistent standards and structure. This skill provides templates, workflows, and best practices for creating skills that work with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Create well-organized skills in minutes.
actual_capabilities: Guide users through skill creation process from purpose definition to testing
Provide 4 template types for different skill complexity levels
Define naming conventions and description best practices
Create workflow files for create and update operations
Structure skills with simple (SKILL.md only) or complex (with CLAUDE.md) patterns
limitations: Does not execute code or modify files directly
Requires manual copy-paste of templates to create actual skill files
Does not validate skill structure automatically
No integration with external skill repositories

use_cases.title: Build first skill
use_cases.description: New users learn to create their first AI skill using simple templates and clear workflows

use_cases.title: Standardize skill patterns
use_cases.description: Developers create consistent, well-documented skills following established conventions

use_cases.title: Extend AI capabilities
use_cases.description: Advanced users add specialized workflows, agent integrations, and complex methodologies

prompt_templates.title: Create Simple Skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new skill called [skill-name] that does [specific task]. Make it a simple skill with just SKILL.md.

prompt_templates.title: Create Complex Skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a complex skill for [domain] that includes SKILL.md and CLAUDE.md with multi-phase workflows.

prompt_templates.title: Add Agent Support
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a skill with agents that can run up to 10 parallel workers for [task type]. Include agent collaboration protocols.

prompt_templates.title: Update Existing Skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the existing [skill-name] skill and improve its structure by adding [new feature] workflow.

output_examples.input: Create a skill for managing my notes that supports tagging and searching
output: Created skills/note-management/SKILL.md with activation triggers for note-related tasks
Included workflow for creating, searching, and tagging notes
Added best practices for note organization
Referenced simple-skill-template structure for quick reference

best_practices: Use lowercase with hyphens for skill names (e.g., note-management, web-scraping)
Include specific activation triggers in description starting with USE WHEN
Choose simple template for single-capability skills, complex template for multi-phase workflows
Test skill activation with natural language phrases before publishing
anti_patterns: Using generic skill names like text-processing instead of descriptive names like fabric-patterns
Forgetting to add skill to global KAI.md available_skills section
Creating complex skills when simple SKILL.md would suffice
Duplicating global context information in individual skills

faq.question: What tools support these skills?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Templates follow Anthropic skill standards compatible with all three platforms.

faq.question: How complex can a skill become?
faq.answer: Skills range from simple SKILL.md files under 100 lines to complex skills with CLAUDE.md, workflows, and supporting subdirectories.

faq.question: How do I integrate with other skills?
faq.answer: Reference other skills in supplementary resources sections using read commands. Define clear handoff protocols for multi-agent workflows.

faq.question: Is data stored or transmitted?
faq.answer: No. This skill contains only documentation templates. It reads no files and sends no data. All skill creation is manual copy-paste.

faq.question: Why is my skill not activating?
faq.answer: Check that description includes USE WHEN triggers matching user phrases. Verify skill added to KAI.md available_skills section. Test with exact trigger phrases.

faq.question: How does this compare to Anthropic skills?
faq.answer: This skill extends Anthropic patterns with PAI-specific conventions. Uses same YAML frontmatter and markdown structure but adds workflow files and agent templates.
